text: Board design is ready for fab - connector fit looks good, new LEDs check out fine.

Did a ton of work on battery/power this morning. Reading through a whitepaper a colleague of mine did on power management, and it looks like we can get the D1000 in deep sleep almost all the time. The radio can go ~4000 hours on our battery (just over 200 days). Conservatively, I think we can hit a 1 month battery life.
So I’m willing to say the 80mAh LiPo is an adequate battery solution.
At least for this pass. Looking into what it will take to get the batteries we need.
